head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GALLAGHER, WILLIAM J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GALLAGHER, WILLIAM J.

block.p: GALLAGHER-William J. On Friday, June 9, 2000, William J. Gallagher of Washington DC. Beloved Husband of the late Vita M. Gallagher; Father of Bonnie L. and John J (Patti) Gallagher; Grandfather of Emily and Brian Gallagher. Services at Collins Funeral Home, 500 University Blvd West, Silver Spring, MD, on Monday June 12 at 1 pm. Interment Pinelawn Memorial Park, Huntington, NY, on Tuesday, June 13 at 2:30 pm. Memorial contributions may be made to Baltimore Washington Institute and Society for Psychoanalysis, 14900 Sweitzer Lane, Laurel, MD, 20707
